selections.name: Archenemy
selections.reason: Put in a strong effort to finish 2nd at this track last start. Drawn the rail and should be peaking third-up.

selections.name: Loona Dawn
selections.reason: Consistent performer who finished 4th last start. Has the speed to overcome the wide draw.

selections.name: Good Show
selections.reason: First starter from the Parnham/Grantham yard. Trials have been quiet but stable commands respect.

selections.name: Just Petty Cash
selections.reason: Resuming off a good trial win. Showed ability on debut last prep.

danger_horse.name: Loona Dawn
danger_horse.reason: Has race fitness and consistency on her side.

selections.name: Extra Zero
selections.reason: Consistent type who rarely runs a bad race. Finished 3rd last start and looks ready to win.

selections.name: Cateran
selections.reason: Beat the top pick home last start when finishing 2nd. Drawn well to repeat the dose.

selections.name: Flaming Dragon
selections.reason: Narrowly beaten into 2nd last start. Improving with every run.

selections.name: Il Bello Beals
selections.reason: Solid 3rd last start. Always competitive in this grade.

danger_horse.name: Cateran
danger_horse.reason: Proved he has the measure of this field last start.

selections.name: Prince Ragnar
selections.reason: Class runner of the field. Consistent form and drops into a winnable race.

selections.name: Gold Keeper
selections.reason: Winner three starts back and solid 3rd last time out. A major threat.

selections.name: Onemoretwomany
selections.reason: Has won 4 races and drawn the pole. Can bounce back to best form here.

selections.name: Be Seated
selections.reason: Competitive in this grade and drawn to get a soft run.

danger_horse.name: Gold Keeper
danger_horse.reason: Recent winning form suggests he is the main danger.

selections.name: Versaille
selections.reason: Won two starts back and followed up with a solid 3rd. In peak form.

selections.name: Deep Discretion
selections.reason: Consistent mare who is rarely far away. Drawn perfectly.

selections.name: Karri On
selections.reason: Not beaten far recently. Value runner if she can overcome the draw.

selections.name: Casino Royale
selections.reason: Top weight but has the class. Drawn barrier 1 is a big plus.

danger_horse.name: Deep Discretion
danger_horse.reason: Honest campaigner who will be in the finish.

selections.name: Safe Hustle
selections.reason: Dominant winner last start by 4 lengths. Hard to go past in this form.

selections.name: Sure No Something
selections.reason: Finished 2nd to Safe Hustle last start. Meets him on similar terms.

selections.name: Tycoon Demon
selections.reason: Consistent placegetter. Drawn the rails to save ground.

selections.name: Bonny Rock
selections.reason: Finished 4th last start. capable of running into the money.

danger_horse.name: Sure No Something
danger_horse.reason: The clear second pick based on last start performance.

selections.name: Miff Muffered Moof
selections.reason: Last start winner at this track. Ideally drawn and looks the one to beat.

selections.name: Sanabeau
selections.reason: Consistent type who finished 4th last start. Will be running on.

selections.name: Let's Sea
selections.reason: Finished 4th in a higher grade race last start. Drops in class.

selections.name: The Rush
selections.reason: Drawn the pole. Can improve on recent form.

danger_horse.name: Sanabeau
danger_horse.reason: Always competitive and due for a win.

selections.name: Now Showing
selections.reason: Coming off a nice win last start. Maintains form and looks hard to beat.

selections.name: Caleb
selections.reason: Also a last start winner, fighting hard to score. Main danger.

selections.name: Hot Nova
selections.reason: Finished 2nd last start at big odds. Can add value to exotics.

selections.name: Truly Supreme
selections.reason: Runner-up last start. Drawn well to be competitive again.

danger_horse.name: Caleb
danger_horse.reason: Winning form is good form. Hard to split from the top pick.
